name: Convoy sagrado beta
description: Digital illustration of the sacred jaguar convoy, the very first version of this Being, initially created for a mural i would have painted around the Magdalena del Mar district market in Lima, Peru around the end of 2020. This character is currently being developed into paintings and drawings. It is a mystic representation of the interprovincial cargo transport of Peru, bridging the Amazon rainforest and the Andes with the rest of the world, with reference to the Ekeko god of luck.
